data.title: Shouting ‘pay your taxes,’ activists occupy Apple retail stores across France
Trump admits to knowing Flynn lies to the FBI when he asked Comey to stop investigation.
Google could be forced to pay over five million UK iPhone users £2.7 billion in compensation as it is accused of selling their data without their consent
Trump transition official in email: Russia 'has just thrown the U.S.A election' to Trump
Kushner Is Said to Have Ordered Flynn to Contact Russia: Now that the retired general has pleaded guilty, the president's son-in-law could be one of the next dominoes to fall.

Backers of a U.S.-Russian plan to build nuclear reactors across the Middle East bragged after the U.S. election they had backing from Donald Trump’s national security adviser Michael Flynn for a project that required lifting sanctions on Russia, documents reviewed by Reuters show.
Former US Marine sentenced to life in prison for rape and murder of Japanese woman
President Donald Trump has said the actions of former national security adviser Michael Flynn after the 2016 presidential election were "lawful".
An Egyptian lawyer has been sentenced to three years in prison for saying that women who wear ripped jeans should be raped in punishment.
India is preparing to land on the moon for the first time in the country's history
